In this lesson, we aim to introduce three main derivative packages: [panelPomp](https://panelpomp-org.github.io/about.html), [spatPomp](https://spatpomp-org.github.io/spatPomp/), and [phylopomp](https://github.com/kingaa/phylopomp).
